data.title: Meggitt Aerospace Asia Pacific Pte Ltd – AAIS
data.text:
Meggitt Aerospace Asia Pacific Pte Ltd

PARENT COMPANY/HEAD OFFICE/SHAREHOLDERS

Meggitt

COMPANY PROFILE

Meggitt’s Singapore Facility serves as the Group’s Asia Pacific headquarters supporting airlines, engine and airframe maintenance providers across the region. The facility provides MRO, parts distribution, sales and marketing and field technical support across a broad range of Meggitt products and technologies.

PRODUCTS & SERVICES

Meggitt Singapore provides repair and overhaul of Meggitt components comprising of Oil Coolers, Heat Exchangers, Valves, Fire Bottles, EPAS, Crew Restraints, Sensors, Electronics, Wheel and Brakes. The site is a spares distribution hub supporting customers in Asia Pacific and provides AOG and technical support from its team based in Singapore.

KEY PROCESSES & CAPABILITIES

An end to end capability to provide repair and overhaul across and extensive range of Meggitt products and technologies. The Singapore site is one of Meggitt’s most advanced site on the deployment of the Meggitt Production System, one of a small number of sites in the fourth stage (or Bronze) of this six stage, continuous improvement journey.

DIFFERENTIATING CHARACTERISTIC

As the OEM, Meggitt’s Singapore site has access to proprietary technical know-how on the products it supports. This combined with short turnaround times and an excellent quality track record, provides unrivalled levels of support to customers in the Asia Pacific region.

STANDARDS

ISO / AS9100, ISO 14001, AS 9110 (MRO) and AS 9120 (Spares Distribution).

CERTIFICATIONS

FAA, CAAC, EASA, CAAS, DCA Mal, CAAT, CAAV

EXECUTIVE INFO

Mr Adrian Bunn

VP / GM Asia Pacific
